metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14348 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
LibRaw before 0.18.4 has a heap-based Buffer Overflow in the processCanonCameraInfo function via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14348` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.17.1-1ubuntu0.1
libraw15 - 0.17.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
